footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at this moment.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to your ceremony here. Click save when you're done.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony. Click save to create it.
deleteCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this ceremony?
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony data.
finishCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to mark this ceremony as finished?
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section and it will no longer be considered an upcoming event.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to mark this ceremony as inactive?
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will be hidden from the active list but will remain in the database.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the current hero video by providing a new URL or uploading a file.
fullPlanUpTo: Full plan can be paid in up to 3 installments
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its origins, benefits, and the sacred ritual we follow.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you on your healing journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Find out how to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for a transformative ceremony.
contactCommunityText: Join our digital channels to stay connected, receive updates on upcoming events, and share your journey with a community that understands and supports you. We are waiting for you!
ayahuascaInfoTitle: A Journey of Healing and Self-Discovery
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral sacred beverage from the Amazon, composed of two master plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). Together, they create a powerful brew that opens the doors to spiritual perception, allowing for deep emotional and psychological healing.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The experience with Ayahuasca is an introspective journey that can reveal deep patterns of our subconscious, release emotional blockages, and offer a clear vision of our life's purpose. Each ceremony is a unique and personal dialogue with your own being.
spiritualMasterTitle: A Spiritual Master, Not a Drug
spiritualMasterDescription: We honor Ayahuasca as a master plant and a spiritual guide, not as a recreational substance. Our approach is based on deep respect for tradition and the commitment to a safe, controlled, and sacred environment for all participants.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find answers to fundamental questions, gaining a clearer perspective on their life path and purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: The medicine helps to process and heal deep traumas, fears, and anxieties, liberating the heart to live more fully.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Participants experience a profound sense of unity with nature, the universe, and their own divine essence.
groupCeremonyDescription: We offer group ceremonies for those who wish to share the experience in a community of support and respect.
privateCeremonyDescription: We also provide private ceremonies for those seeking a more intimate and personalized healing process.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the loving and experienced souls who will accompany you on this transformative journey. Each of our guides is deeply committed to your well-being and spiritual growth.
editGuideDescription: Update the guide's information. Click save when you are finished.
deleteGuideConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this guide?
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide's profile.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our upcoming and past events. Each one is a unique opportunity for healing and transformation.
preparationProcessDescription: The journey begins before the ceremony. Proper preparation is key to a profound experience.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where healing and transformation are possible under expert guidance.
experienceProcessDescription: An inner journey of visions, emotions, and revelations that lead to self-discovery.
integrationProcessDescription: We support you in applying the lessons learned to your daily life for lasting change.
dietSubtitle: We recommend following this diet for at least 3-5 days before and after the ceremony to purify your body.
allowedFoodsList: Lean proteins (chicken, fish, tofu) in moderation
Herbal teas and plenty of water
prohibitedFoodsList: Fermented foods (aged cheese, soy sauce, yogurt)
mentalPrepSubtitle: Create a space of tranquility and openness to receive the medicine.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal or understand. Write down your intentions.
reflectionDescription: Write about your feelings, fears, and hopes before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca is a powerful tool for confronting and healing deep emotional wounds. The ceremony provides a safe space to release repressed emotions, forgive past hurts, and cultivate a state of inner peace and self-love. It is an opportunity to rewrite your emotional story and move towards a freer and more authentic life.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: To ensure your comfort and well-being during the experience.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, layered clothing (white or light colors preferably)
A blanket and a pillow or cushion
A notebook and pen for journaling
essentialsList: A change of clothes for the next day
An open heart and a curious mind
Any personal amulet or sacred object
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to access exclusive content, book your ceremony, and prepare for your transformation. It's free and only takes a minute.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You are now signed in.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with your Google account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your healing path.
registerSuccessDescription: We've sent a verification link to your email. Please check your inbox.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Adjust the color palette for light and dark modes.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users.
allUsersDescription: A list of all users in the system.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! I'm inviting you to our WhatsApp group for ceremony preparation. Join here:
allConversationsDescription: Review the history of all interactions with the chatbot.
chatHistorySubtitle: Explore conversations between users and the spiritual guide.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's answers to the pre-ceremony questionnaire.
noAnswersSubmitted: No questionnaire has been submitted by this user yet.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the form. You can review your answers below.
questionnaireDescription: Your answers are confidential and will help us ensure a safe and profound experience for you.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions? (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medication, especially for depression or anxiety?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: If yes, please specify the medication and dosage.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions? (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder)
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your experience.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
dialogSuccessDescription: You have successfully submitted your questionnaire. The next step is to review the preparation guide to get ready for your journey.
chatbotWelcome: Welcome. I am the Spiritual Guide. How may I help you on your path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
